entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is the mother of Harry's friends and is concerned about his well-being. She says that she wants to know what has been going on and asks her children to leave the kitchen.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a friend of Harry's father and is present in the scene. He suggests that Harry should be allowed to have a say in what is going on.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is also a friend of Harry's father and agrees with Sirius that Harry should be allowed to decide for himself.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the scene. He wants to know what has been going on and feels that he is being treated like a child by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's friend and sister of Ron. She wants to stay in the kitchen with her family.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's best friend and brother of Ginny. He also wants to stay in the kitchen.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's other close friend. She is asked by Mrs. Weasley to leave the kitchen along with her siblings.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of Harry's friends and twin brother of George. He argues that he and his brother are old enough to stay in the kitchen.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is another friend of Harry's and twin brother of Fred. He also argues that they should be allowed to stay in the kitchen.
